resources.string: Pepino
Settings
Trendy & Vintage Fashion Items
Buy & Sell pre-owned fashion luxury items
Click to Sell
Continue
How it works:
- Click on "CONTINUE" to send us a request to list your luxury fashion items on Pepino
- Provide the name of the item, condition and at least one picture on a white background
- Provide your account details including your name and phone number
- Send
- We will review your request and list it if it meets our criteria
- Upon purchase, you have 48 hours to send the item to the address sent you by us
- Payment will be made into your account within 72 hours on your item purchase
- NOTE: Buyers have 24 hours to file for return
Thank You!
- Click on "Continue To Buy"
- Enter the name of the items you want to purchase, with your phone number
- A confirmation will be sent to you within 24 hours on purchase
- Pay via the mobile money account sent you
- Item will be received within 48 hours after confirmation
Buy
Continue To Buy
Exciting! Check out these super cool luxury fashion items at very affordable prices. Get pepino on the PlayStore now
